info.title: Savoy API Doc
info.description:
*      All Requests need Api_Key Authentication,
 *      User Pages, Checkouts and Order Request need Bearer Token Authentication

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 0 for main categories, Category ID for sub categories of selected category

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Filter by category_id | If you fill search_text, category_id will not work.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Limit is 20. You can change offset for pagination

description.example: Ipsam facere dolorem tempore laboriosam nostrum molestiae non et quo earum aliquam voluptatem ratione ea occaecati quos quia qui sequi autem vitae rem nihil dolorum cumque excepturi voluptatibus est nulla dicta est rerum et harum autem est iure ut aut non soluta.

get.summary: Has this product been favorited by the user? | Need Bearer Token Authentication

requestBody.description: Schema helps reqired/or not and other descriptions.

company_select.description: this part must taken from get-address suggessions

200.description: Suggesion List | Use id For Company Select | Show Address to Customer

address.example: Savoycell, Unit 41, Savoy Centre, 140 Sauchiehall Street, Glasgow

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Use Order ID to Find Detail
